profileAlternative.name: Priyanka Bedarkar
profileAlternative.headline: Software Developer Intern at Uber
profileAlternative.summary: My objective is to actively contribute to innovative projects involving applications of Deep Learning to Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing. I am currently interning at Uber Technologies for the summer of 2019. I am pursuing my MS in Computer Science at Stony Brook University. I worked as a Software Engineer at Indus OS from Jan 2017 to July 2018. I pursued my undergraduate thesis at Video Analytics Lab, Indian Institute of Science from June 2016 to December 2016 wherein we analyzed the image and caption complexity in an attempt to establish a relationship between them. I received my B.E. (Hons.) Computer Science degree from BITS Pilani Goa Campus in July 2017.

aboutAlternative.text: My objective is to actively contribute to innovative projects involving applications of Deep Learning to Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing. positions.title: Graduate Student Researcher
positions.companyName: Computer Vision Lab At Stony Brook University

positions.title: Teaching Assistant
positions.description: I am TA for undergraduate Machine Learning course.

positions.title: Indus OS
positions.description:
Worked in the Data Science Team. Managed and improved the data pipeline that transforms server logs to databases using Amazon Web Services. Analyzed user behavior, built models for targeting users effectively leading to increased user engagement.
Technologies used - AWS (S3 and Redshift), Python, MongoDB.

positions.title: Research Intern
positions.description: Pursued my undergraduate thesis at Video Analytics Lab, CDS, IISc under the guidance of Prof. R. Venkatesh Babu. Characterized image complexity and caption complexity in terms of scene elements, inter-element relations and trained Deep Learning models to establish a relationship between image and caption complexity using MSCOCO and Visual Genome Dataset...

educations.title: Birla College of Arts Science & Commerce Birla College Road Kalyan Dist Thane 421 304

items: Deforestation Trends from 2012 to 2018 using satellite imagery
New System Call in the Kernel
Crimes Classification and Prediction using Apache Hadoop
Feature Selection and Classification using Scikit Learn

profile.name: Priyanka Bedarkar
profile.headline: Software Developer Intern at Uber
profile.summary: My objective is to actively contribute to innovative projects involving applications of Deep Learning to Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing. I am currently interning at Uber Technologies for the summer of 2019. I am pursuing my MS in Computer Science at Stony Brook University. I worked as a Software Engineer at Indus OS from Jan 2017 to July 2018. I pursued my undergraduate thesis at Video Analytics Lab, Indian Institute of Science from June 2016 to December 2016 wherein we analyzed the image and caption complexity in an attempt to establish a relationship between them. I received my B.E. (Hons.) Computer Science degree from BITS Pilani Goa Campus in July 2017.
